item.title: Attributes In Drupal
item.description: Drupal 10.2 is out, with an easier content management by improving user experience, and with some performance improvements in caching and HTTP responses. It is also compatible with PHP 8.3, and it started using PHP attributes.

item.title: Single Directory Components
item.description: The Drupal frontend development has long been intricate and demanding, however Drupal 10 introduces a game-changer — Single Directory Components (SDC).

item.title: The Journey So Far
item.description: This is my initial post sharing my journey in web development so far — a journey that commenced during my college days and ultimately steered me towards becoming a passionate Drupal enthusiast.
